name: A Baby Dinosaur Race FREE - Run, Jump & Roar!
name_original: A Baby Dinosaur Race FREE - Run, Jump & Roar!
description:
"DINOSAURS & POWER UPS - LETS GO!"

WOAH Baby Dino just hatched and lost his Mommy! He needs your help to escape the scary dinosaurs and find his way home!

Luckily on your journey you'll collect eggs to help you mature from Baby Dino to Teen Dino and finally into a fully grown T-REX with roar attack! :-) Don't forget to pick up some cool Power ups on the way!

FEATURES INCLUDE:

• Real time Multiplayer or Single Player modes

• 5 unique playable dinosaurs:
- Baby Dino
- Teen Dino
- Trex - with roar attack
- Blue Triceratops - with spike attack
- Gold Pterodactyl - with egg shot attack

• 4 Power up Eggs to collect:
- Mega Jump -> x2 your normal jump height
- Speed -> Get a fast speed boost
- Bomb -> Destroys all bad guys on the screen
- Magnet -> Attracts all Eggs to you

• Instant Replay Mode - Every go is recorded so you can watch and share your epic score!

• Awesome retro soundtrack

• Easy controls

How far will you get in this prehistoric endless fun adventure?

Download NOW for FREE to find out…
